SPZ Archive Tool is a lump management program which provides the most basic functionality with some newer stuff. It was made by [[SPZ]] using Visual C# and the .NET Framework. [http://spamzilla.unaux.com It is available here on the Spamzilla website]. Some features include:
[[File:SPZ AT2.png|thumb|A screenshot of SPZ Archive Tool displaying the Heresiarch]] [[File:SPZ Archive Tool.png|thumb|Screenshot of SPZ Archive Tool]]
*Tabbed / Split-Panel display **Supports swapping panels **Resizeable *WAD / PAK / ZIP / PK3 Support *PNG / Patch Sprite Offset Editor *Lump Rearrangement / Importing / Deleting / Insert Marker / Copy / Paste *Text Editor with syntax highlighting *TEXTUREx / PNAMES editor *Sprite Offset editing for Patch and PNG textures *Convert Hexen maps into UDMF maps *Flip sectors upside down *Hexadecimal / byte / char / image / map viewer **Map Image dragging, scaling and exporting **Map viewer supports Doom / Hexen / UDMF formats **Hex display has optional char column like a hex editor **Custom line break frequency *Class View which includes DECORATE / ZSCRIPT / GZDoom classes **Display is in an inherited fashion **Color Coordinated **Double click to show the text editor *Automatic backup (on by default) *.WAV audio playback *Search feature which can highlight multiple searches at once per tab *Toggle between PWAD / IWAD *Ability to flip Doom and Hexen format SECTORS *A few other features
